section.title: My Experience
section.literallayout: Attorney At Law with 20 years of experience with main practice areas: corporate and business law, banking and finance, commercial law and enforcement, with significant legal practice in the field of criminal law. I have an extensive experience in the contract law that she has elaborated at the University of Sarajevo Master of European Studies 2012.

listitem.para: Bar Association of Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina
Certified Court interpreter of Federation BiH

section.para: For the past 4 years I have led Legal departments of two biggest oil companies from MOL-INA Group in the Bosnia and Herzegovina and also led Legal department in telecommunication sector for company Telemach d.o.o., including corporate development, privacy and data security compliance, employment law, vendor risk management, and general business operations. She managed complex transactions (acquisitions/investments in excess of 1 mil EUR) as well as day to day matters such as contracts with vendors, employees and management. I served as an advisor to Management Board regarding regulatory issues related to the company’s products and services across both jurisdictions in BiH. I advised Management Board on business risks associated with new strategies and mitigating those risks while preserving innovation within the organization.

article.para: I also worked as a Senior Associate at Miljković&Partners Law firm in Sarajevo with focus areas of civil litigation, contract law, corporate and business law. Represent plaintiffs and defendants in civil cases and manage all phases of the litigation process from investigation, pleadings and discovery to pre-trial, trial, settlement and appeal. I advised clients on various corporate and regulatory aspects of their business. I gained extensive experience as a Legal Counsel in major factoring company Prvi Faktor on various complex legal aspects of numerous corporate, finance and regulatory matters; assisting with regard to due diligence investigations of individual financial aspects of the transactions, drafting and negotiating various transaction documents, as well as monitoring of implementation of all condition precedents and securitization of transactions including collection of bad debts. Before joining Prvi Faktor I was legal associate with B&H Prosecutor's Office and was involved in several major investigations related to white-collar crime. Upon graduation I was legal advisor within the Anti-crime and corruption Department of the Office of High Representative, an institution established in line with the Dayton Peace Agreement implementing various legal and political aspects of the Dayton Peace Agreement including establishing of independent judiciary system in B&H.
